entry.title: Fruity's Jelly Tropical Flavour - Case of 24
entry.summary:
Vendor: DinDon Foods Corp.
Type: Candy
Price: 0.00

From the Makers of the Treat that Became TikTok Famous!

     Relax and feel the warm ocean breeze as you take another bite of Fruity's Ju-C Jelly Tropical Flavour snacks! This tropical treat comes in the flavours of Mango, Passion Fruit, and Lychee, transporting you on an island adventure you won't be able to forget. Each of these snacks come in an easy-to-open cup, so you can enjoy more of the sweet, addicting jelly taste!

     You'll come to understand how these jelly snacks got so popular on TikTok after experiencing the burst of tasty flavour, and they're even better when served chilled or frozen!

     These are the perfect treats for loot bags, birthday parties, or any sort of family celebration. Don't let the bright colours deceive you, Fruity's Jelly Tropical Flavour are fun for adults and kids alike!

 

288g x 24 | 1 Case
